scripts.watch:all: parallelshell " npm run sass" "npm run lite"
scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin agenda.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/agenda.html && usemin highlights.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/highlights.html && usemin members.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/members.html && usemin navigation.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/navigation.html && usemin profile.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/profile.html && usemin roles.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/roles.html
scripts.copyFavicon: copyfiles -f site.webmanifest dist/ && copyfiles -f favicon-16x16.png dist/  && copyfiles -f apple-touch-icon.png dist/  && copyfiles -f favicon-32x32.png dist/
scripts.imagemin: imagemin assets/images/* -o dist/assets/images && imagemin favicon-16x16.png -o dist/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
